website_summaries.verdict: These all-natural votive candles may be pricy, but their honey scent, long burn time, and hypoallergenic properties make these candles worth the investment.
pros: Available in sets of 4, 18, and 36 votive candles
Your choice of black, ivory, and plain beeswax colors
15 hours of burn time per candle
cons: A fairly expensive set of votive candles

customer_reviews.title: If you love candles and you use them often
customer_reviews.text: You pay $3 per tiny candle that burns out within 1 use / 4 hrs (not 15 hrs as advertised). The non-toxicity doesn't justify the price. If you love candles and you use them often, this candle is not for you. unless you're sitting on a bank.
customer_reviews.author: lampdoor23

customer_reviews.title: Great Candles!
customer_reviews.text: Some beeswax votive candle reviews mention short burn times, wick issues, or other burning-related problems. Burned two of these so far and have had no such problems. As many have noted, they give off a pleasant and light fragrance of honey (as all beeswax candles do), burn bright orange, and are very well made.
customer_reviews.author: hckynphl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, with Lovely Honey Smell
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful natural beeswax color with a lovely smell. The only thing I'll note is that, although it doesn't say so on the product description, in the package there was a warning that these candles are designed to melt and turn liquid like votive candles do and should be burned in a container. However, I've been using them for short burns and so far they have not actually melted and turned liquid (this is not a complaint, just an observation that you may want to get a votive holder if you don't already have one if you're planning on burning these candles for long periods of time, but for short periods, e.g., for meditation sessions, it's probably unnecessary).
customer_reviews.author: E.P. Clark

customer_reviews.title: SHORT BURN TIME
customer_reviews.text: They burn for 2 hours MAX. No where near the advertised 15 hours. Besides that theyre okay but they straight lied about the brun time
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: and was completely satisfied with the quality
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased from Bluecorn Naturals before, and was completely satisfied with the quality, cost and speed of delivery. This time I looked around more, and found no comparable seller - so I ordered again! Fine, clean, dense wax with the pleasing smell and long-lasting appeal that only the best candles can offer. I will not bother looking at alternatives in the future, and plan to switch to their products whenever I have candle needs. There's no excuse for not getting the best - at a really good price and the best service.
customer_reviews.author: Absalom

customer_reviews.title: Slow burning, beautiful candles. Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent candles! Thrilled with the quality and they burn slowly and with long, elegant flame. No smell either which is a plus, though who could object to the gentle aroma of beeswax. Thanks for the great product and good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Oz Gal

customer_reviews.title: high quality candles worth trying
customer_reviews.text: these candles are great! they burn for a long time and when they are done there's nothing left but the wick holder, just about every last drop of wax is gone! these candles may have a slight natural scent of beeswax, burn very clean and the wicks are easy to relight to use for many days. best of all, when i burn these candles my congestion and respiratory inflammation disappear and i can breathe so easily, was not expecting this, but clear proof they clean the air. highly recommend overall and ordered the tealights now to give those a try.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Burn too quickly!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the votive because I wanted a natural candle that would last a decent bit of time. It burned down completely in about 2.5 hours! I am so bummed!! Yes, I trimmed the wick. I would return it but since we are self-isolating, I do not want to go to the UPS Store. I also bought the tea lights. I hope I have better luck with them.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Candles
customer_reviews.text: So glad we found these natural beeswax candles! They burn well and don't give off any obnoxious, harmful odors, which is not something you can say about those cheap, scented ones, made out of who knows what, which seem to be everywhere now. We love burning candles and decided that natural beauty and good health was worth the search and cost and happily found Bluecorn Naturals on Amazon to fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Charles L. Laurenzi

customer_reviews.title: Good candles
customer_reviews.text: Very clean burning and no smoke from the wicks. My previous purchase of beeswas candles disappointed me so that I had to try a new brand. Bluecorn candles are slightly more pricey than the ones I used to buy but are way better.
customer_reviews.author: Yohan

customer_reviews.title: Beeswax candles
customer_reviews.text: These are great little votive candles. Light scent. Burns clean. They burn long enough for their size. So i don’t get the reviews that have a problem with their burn time. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Ekerri

customer_reviews.title: love the scent they give off too
customer_reviews.text: I use these guys as my survival candles as they burn longer then any other wax out there. love the scent they give off too.
customer_reviews.author: Trell

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, Love Bluecorn! I wouldn't buy any other Beeswax Candles. Love them. Thank you for providing such amazing pure candles!!
customer_reviews.author: E. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Real deal
customer_reviews.text: I dunno if this is normal, but a handful of bees showed up when I tried burning one of these outside. Has a subtle pleasant scent of honey. - candle needs to be put in a container or it will burn quickly and become a pool of Wax
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Loved them but they do burn fast
customer_reviews.text: Loved them but they do burn fast. We're fragrance free but I love candles. Saved my leftover wax and melted them down with coconut oil to make squares I could use in my old scentsy burner with a little vanilla or cinnamon. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: TwinkiesMommy

customer_reviews.title: Would make a nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly via Prime shipping. The candles have a light scent that is not overpowering. I am confident that this was a healthy choice. The packaging was very nice (simple cardboard box, but right-sized, and the candles look very pretty inside the box.) For that reason, this would make a nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: element2011

customer_reviews.title: These candles are fantastic! They burn cleanly and for a decent amount ...
customer_reviews.text: These candles are fantastic! They burn cleanly and for a decent amount of time (I didn't time it, but I put it in a votive holder and left it burning most of the afternoon).
customer_reviews.author: sandra g.

customer_reviews.title: Have terrible allergies and was told pure beeswax candles would not ...
customer_reviews.text: Have terrible allergies and was told pure beeswax candles would not aggravate my allergies. These are good candles and exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Ama1478

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: These candles had really no natrual "honey" scent as advertised and the candle burned itself out in one hour. I would not recommend them at all
customer_reviews.author: Disney Maven

customer_reviews.title: Good candles.
customer_reviews.text: Nice slow burning candles. They put out a wonderful honey scent when you blow them out. And not bad for your lungs like cheap candles.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: I would buy them again
customer_reviews.text: These seem like a very nice quality candle. Pleased with purchase. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Logan's mom

customer_reviews.title: pure beeswax works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because unlike scented candles that use petroleum in their product, this does not and pure beeswax actually purifies the air.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Ripoli

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't appear to be real bees wax.
customer_reviews.text: These don't appear to be 100% beeswax. 100% beeswax will bloom and these never have. As one more test we set one of these Bluecorn Beeswax candles next to a Beeswax Candle Works Inc candle and only the Beeswax Candle Works Inc bloomed, not the Bluecorn Beeswax candle.
customer_reviews.author: Brusso

customer_reviews.title: Seller recommended to blow out the candle after two hours to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied with this product. Wick burns too hot and leaves soot on glass holder. Seller recommended to blow out the candle after two hours to trim wick. Many years of burning beeswax candles, have never had a candle do this. Thought we would try out a new product. Definitely won't continue burning these votives. Request a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Oggie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price point
customer_reviews.text: Candles are as described High quality Soft scent Burns as expected
customer_reviews.author: speechteach

customer_reviews.title: Smokey, darn it!
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give these 5 stars in totality, however, the candles produce lots of smoke and residue. I’ve never had 100% beeswax do that before. Ive had the tea lights before, and they didn’t smoke. Perhaps, it’s the wicks in the votives?
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: good quality, slow burn
customer_reviews.text: First time to use beeswax candles. Burns very slowly and clean.
customer_reviews.author: mark woeppel

customer_reviews.title: Smell great but small
customer_reviews.text: These candles smell lovely while burning. However, they are a lot smaller than I realized. That normally wouldn't be an issue, except that they also burn very quickly, and as I had them free-standing (as opposed to in a votive) they don't last very long. I would recommend using them only in votive holders if you want them to last.
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The votive candles are great and I was glad that the product dimensions were available prior to purchase so I knew that they would fit in the votive holders I already had. They burn nicely, to me they have a very light natural scent and do what I expect a votive to do, which is melt evenly and fill up the votive holder it is placed in.
customer_reviews.author: Jen S.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in votive candles
customer_reviews.text: Trimmed the wicks as suggested, used the correct size votive container. My candle lasted a skimpy 2 hrs. not the 15 as advertised, very disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft smell and helps with allergies! I can tell a difference in the air quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look good, smell good
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as s gift. They smell wonderful and look perfect, but of course I didnt burn them . I'll come back and update this review when my DIL gives me feed back on how they burn
customer_reviews.author: SophieW

customer_reviews.title: They smell great: ) Wish I hadn't burned them
customer_reviews.text: They smell great :) Wish I hadn't burned them. Smelling Beeswax is way more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Bad Candles!!
customer_reviews.text: These little candles burn down very quickly....not worth the purchase!! And make a big mess!! Do not buy!! Bad Deal....
customer_reviews.author: Laughoutloud!!!!😂

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: Literally the worst candle I have ever purchased. After ONE use the entire candle burnt out. So ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: Zeldasfury

customer_reviews.title: Long clean burn time
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, no smell and long burn time for a votive size candle
customer_reviews.author: Mike Jaques

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer of Bluecorn Naturals 100% Beeswax Votives
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this as a gift for my daughter. She got them last year and has asked for more, so I suppose she's pleased with the candles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. I'm very happy with this product and the speed at which it arrived, earlier than expected! I highly recommend this product and this company!
customer_reviews.author: JM10

customer_reviews.title: These Bluecorn Naturals Pure Beeswax Votives are a great purchase. They don't burn too quickly and they ...
customer_reviews.text: These Bluecorn Naturals Pure Beeswax Votives are a great purchase. They don't burn too quickly and they definitely help cleanse the air. I notice a big difference when we use them. I love that they are non-toxic. My son has recently discovered allergies that we are working to combat, and these votives are hypoallergeneic and really helping in that area. We will purchase more of these once they run out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: I love the gentle honey scent and they seem to burn very clean but they say they have a 15-hour burn time and the two I've lit have each lasted barely 5 hours each.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Very good candles for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: High-quality wax and wicks, light honey scent. Burn steadily and cleanly. Reasonably long burn time so long as you keep the wick well trimmed. Very good candles for a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: they burn good-would be nice if they were offered in different aromas.
customer_reviews.author: kevin carter

customer_reviews.title: Beeswax candles are the best!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased from Bluecorn Naturals many times. They always deliver high quality candles. Beeswax candles are a cleaner longer lasting burn than any other candle I have ever tried. 5 Stars Bluecorn Naturals. I will be back for more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice candle.
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice. Burned for 15 hours. Appreciate instruction that candle will melt as it burns for place in votive holder-- I was expecting it to burn like a taper.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Anixter

customer_reviews.title: Don't smell of Beeswax
customer_reviews.text: They don't smell like beeswax candles so that's a bit of a problem. Burn time is good.
customer_reviews.author: AMSR

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these. The smell is so organic and refreshing. But they do burn down quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nicely crafted and boxed. What's not to like about bees wax?
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: These smell great. But
customer_reviews.text: These smell great. But, I trimmed the wicks down to 1/4" and they are almost burned out after only 30 minutes. Two of the four in my box almost appear to have been hollow on the inside. Great smell, but not worth the cost versus usable time.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Elizabeth Price

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I don't think these are real beeswax - they burn too fast!
customer_reviews.author: SARAH LINK

customer_reviews.title: they're small
customer_reviews.text: these candle were very small and burned quickly but I still liked them would buy again but maybe bigger
customer_reviews.author: mariana

customer_reviews.title: Great beeswax candles
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent candles. They burn clean and smooth. Packed well and shipping was fast also.
customer_reviews.author: another reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Scent is light and fresh, and the candles burn ...
customer_reviews.text: Scent is light and fresh, and the candles burn sometimes much longer for them they were reputed to.
customer_reviews.author: Karen bond

customer_reviews.title: Nice candles in bulk!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, not much to say. They are nice candles, the make great gifts and the can be used as mega tea candles.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: I just love these candles
customer_reviews.text: Not all 100% bees wax candles are the same. Bluecorn Naturals votives are wonderful. I hate most scented candles. These burn clean with a natural understated fresh aroma. I use them as part of a mindfulness practice that helps me manage the high level of stress currently in my life.
customer_reviews.author: AKL in Nairobi

customer_reviews.title: Candles
customer_reviews.text: Best thing to burn in your home especially if you have allergies. I would recommend this company to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: excellent product & can't beat the real thing
customer_reviews.text: very fast arrival, excellent product & can't beat the real thing, beeswax!

customer_reviews.title: ... Much Smaller than photo of what i ordered where good size Candle was in Glass Holder
customer_reviews.text: Not Happy as they're Much Smaller than photo of what i ordered where good size Candle was in Glass Holder, What Happened ??
customer_reviews.author: Michael J

customer_reviews.title: Good quality natural product which smells great
customer_reviews.text: Good quality natural product which smells great! I put mine in a tight fitting votive jar, and although the wax melts to liquid, the candle burns for many hours. Have bought these twice now and am very satisfied with my purchase. Made in USA!
customer_reviews.author: John F.

customer_reviews.title: A good product.
customer_reviews.text: Clean burning and long lasting. My only quibble: the waxy residue left in my containers is very difficult to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Loves Knitting

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: These burn longer than any other candle I have ever used. Makes the air cleaner and is non-toxic like regular candles. Will definitely buy these again.

customer_reviews.title: These are excellent beeswax votives
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent beeswax votives. The wick is anchored into the very bottom so they burn longer than other beeswax brands.

customer_reviews.title: Good clean burning candles
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 4 pack of votives and just started using them. Good product that burns clean. Look forward to trying more candles for the house.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great candles with long clean burn times. Beeswax are the only candles we use..Great value....

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These candles have a beautiful energy, wonderful for meditation or healing sessions.

customer_reviews.title: clean and make good company when I just want to relax
customer_reviews.text: These burn warm, clean and make good company when I just want to relax.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality candles! I get all my beneswax candles here.

customer_reviews.text: These are great candles, we use them for my wife's massage business, for their long burn time and the wonderful aroma of beeswax.

customer_reviews.text: I love these candles and they last a long time – also nice packaging.

customer_reviews.title: Beeswax Candles that are exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles. They burn cleanly and last a long time (if you trim the wick). They were exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: SweetSue

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, best price, quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't have time for reviews. This product is great. Have purchased many different sizes on several occasions. Product has come quickly and wonderful. Better than I expected! These guys rock!
customer_reviews.author: Madame Nicole Silverman

customer_reviews.title: too small for price
customer_reviews.text: thought candles would be much bigger not worth the price

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice clean burning pure candles. A good buy, and a good find! Thank you Bluecorn.

customer_reviews.title: Very short burn time
customer_reviews.text: These only burned for about 45 minutes to maybe about any hour before completely melting down to nothing. They seemed as though they were hollow on the inside. I know they are small candles but I was expecting them to last longer than an hour. I was hoping to at least get a few hours out of each candle. It was very disappointing.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Great candles! Very affective at covering/ ionizing cigarette smoke from a gross inconsiderate neighbor.

customer_reviews.title: Very Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I completely satisfied with high quality beeswax candles. I want to buy Bluecorn candles every time. I'm enjoying with its warm light hours and hours. It became very cozy in a room when I lead this candle. My family very like it. This bees wax fills the air a pleasant smell. Very recommend. Thank you Bluecorn.

customer_reviews.title: burned for only a couple hours.
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend this product. info said 15 hr burn time, even if they meant for all four together it did not come close!

customer_reviews.text: Bluecorn Naturals 100% Pure Beeswax Votive burn cleanly without dripping so I was told by someone. I haven't used my yet.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Candkes that Perforn and are Healthy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent candles. They burn evenly and always yo the end. They have a gentle beeswax aroma which I love. It's great having candles to use on a daily basis that are non toxic and provide good air quality.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Looks like they are one and done
customer_reviews.text: I had these burning for 2 hours, which is when I noticed they had completely melted flat. Looks like they are one and done. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Once you light up one of these votives you will see the quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with all beeswax candles. They have such a pretty amber hue in the glass votive holder. I was surprised at how long just one votive burns.....I only have good things to say about these candles; I highly recommend this product for everyone who wants to try candles without all the toxic chemicals. After all what you breathe enters your body so it's very important to buy the cleanest candles you can find. I really like this company. They are exceptional in every way!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect candles!!!
customer_reviews.text: Burns evenly all the way down. Very pleased. Good pricing. Helped with the odor in my musty room. Although more needs to be done about the odor, the candles do help a lot! Also gives me that warm cozy feeling when close to them. I’m super impressed
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: These candles actually ‘clean the air.’
customer_reviews.text: I love these natural beeswax candles. I have respiratory disease and beeswax candles are the only ones I can use without becoming congested. Beeswax candles actually clean the air making breathing easier for me. Unfortunately, have to throw away the scented Yankee Candle paraffin based candles.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Beeswax candles are the bees knees
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased these several times and are very happy. They don't have strong scent, but we got them to purify the air and we are still alive, so that seems to be working. These are high quality candles, well made, and last as long as you would expect for their size.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M Connell

customer_reviews.title: These gorgeous candles make me happy
customer_reviews.text: I think these must be the best beeswax candles in the galaxy. They burn long, and clean. There is absolutely no wax left on the sides of the candle holder or at the bottom. These candles make me happy and I am recommending them to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Maevester

customer_reviews.title: clean burning candles
customer_reviews.text: these smell great and seem to burn clean. I cannot handle synthetic fragrance so these are a wonderful option. I wish they made birthday candles
customer_reviews.author: B. Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Burning time 30 minutes until completely melted
customer_reviews.text: They burn down to nothing in 30 minutes. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again & again & again!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!!! My husband is miserable this time of year with pollen allergies! Medications don't help at all. Decided to try this to see if it could help. It HAS! When he starts sneezing I light this candle and within minutes the sneezing stops, eyes stop watering, and he can function. Grateful to find Bluecorn Naturals!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Anderson

product_meta.title: Bluecorn Beeswax 100% Pure Beeswax Votives (4 Pack, Raw)
feature_bullets: 100% Pure Beeswax: Scented by honey, colored by pollen.
Each votive measures 1.75"x 2" and will burn for 15 hours in a snug holder (not included)
Emits negative ions that cleanse the air.
